KSEN_LRC_TYPE.NAME: Grade
KSEN_LRC_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: The result of an assessment, typically of a course

KSEN_LRC_TYPE.NAME: Fixed
KSEN_LRC_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A result grouping that includes just a single result value

KSEN_LRC_TYPE.NAME: Multiple
KSEN_LRC_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Multiple explicitly named values from which one may be choosen

KSEN_LRC_TYPE.NAME: Range
KSEN_LRC_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: A grouping that indicates a range of numeric values with a specified increment. It is not necessary that all of the values within that range have been explicitly pre-defined
